title: Conan and Heiji, Code of Love (Part 2)

infobox.Title:: Conan and Heiji, Code of Love
infobox.Japanese title:: コナンと平次 恋の暗号  (Konan to Heiji Koi no Angō)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Heiji Hattori  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Goro Otaki  Kazuha Toyama  Yakumaru
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo and Seiji Muta (supervisors)  763 Keiko Sasaki  764 Akio Kawamura
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Ryo Horikawa as Heiji Hattori  Yuko Miyamura as Kazuha Toyama  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Norio Wakamoto as Goro Otaki  Yoshimitsu Takasugi as Man #1  Youhei Hamada as Police Detective  Hidenobu Kiuchi as Yakumaru (Man #3)

sections.Situation:
The Detective Boys are on the streets when Conan mentions to Haibara that he texted Masumi about the identity of the mysterious child and got the reply of "the little sister from outside the domain". They encounter a drug dealer and are to solve a code left by the dealer's notebook. This will determine the next drug transaction happening on the day itself.

At the Osaka Ebisu bridge, Heiji details the three suspects he notices on the bridge: a large build man with white roses, a young woman with a white rose hair clip, and a average build man with bleached hair, a tattoo and white rose pinned to his shirt. During his description of the third man, he sees Kazuha talking with him and is distracted by it.
sections.People:
- Drug dealer
- Has a bouquet of white roses
- White rose in hair
- White rose pinned to shirt
- Osaka Prefecture Police detective
sections.Resolution: Heiji thought that the bleached haired man was the criminal, and when the police comrades came to drag Kazuha away to safety, he became mad and accidently yelled for the policemen to 'get away from my Kazuha'!
